EmailTemplate.description: Remind to enter contract dates for closed won opportunity
EmailTemplate.name: Past Due: Update Contract Dates
EmailTemplate.subject: PAST DUE: Closed Won Opportunity WITH OUT Contract Dates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Customer Success Team, This is an auto generated email to inform you that the opportunity, "{!Opportunity.Name}", is closed won for 24 hours.
Please update the record with Contract Start and End Dates.
Thank You!
